messages.title: Creating Opportunity For Everyone
messages.content: Welsh Liberal Democrats will cut your taxes, expand free childcare, increase jobs & apprenticeships, improve mental health services and raise pensions. Just a few ways we plan to create opportunity for all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will transform the way in which mental health services are funded.
Pensioners are £850 better off thanks to the Lib Dems policy on pensions.
Every child from a poor background gets an extra £2,500 spent on their education.
Lib Dems are campaigning to ensure there is a minimum nurse to patient ratio.
Lib Dems have cut your tax bill by £800 and plan to cut by another £400, and crack down on 0-hour contracts.

issues.economy: Lib Dems have cut your tax bill by £800 and plan to cut by another £400.
issues.education: Every child from a poor background gets an extra £2,500 spent on their education.
issues.health: Will transform the way in which mental health services are funded.
issues.socialWelfare: Pensioners are £850 better off thanks to the Lib Dems policy on pensions.

contactInformation.address: Welsh Lib Dems, FREEPOST RLXJ-BLBX-XYJH, 38 The Parade, CF24 3AD

images.caption: Samuel Ellis Rees portrait with Welsh Liberal Democrats logo.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet encourages to volunteer and support Samuel Ellis Rees and offers a section to get involved by providing personal details and preferences for volunteering.
